settings.label: Checkout button class names
settings.info: Enter the pre-defined css classes to apply your own style.

settings.label: Show ratings
settings.info: Show ratings in cart item

settings.label: Enable quick payments
settings.info: Allow customers to checkout using Apple Pay, Shop Pay or PayPal. This will reduce the customers' checkout time and increase your conversion

settings.label: Enable order note
settings.info: Allow customers to enter a note in the cart

settings.label: Enable discount code input
settings.info: Allow customers to enter a discount code in the cart

settings.label: Primary Color
settings.info: This color will be used for active goals or purchase goal progress

settings.label: Discount Color
settings.info: This color will be used for discounted price labels

settings.subheadline: Display a sliding announcement at the top of the cart. This is useful when you want to show a special announcement or promotion.

settings.label: Headlines
settings.info: Add a headline (or multiple) to the top of the cart

settings.label: Always float the reward section on top of the cart
Change free gift button class names
settings.info: This button will show in the free gift item in the cart. This button is used to remove the free gift from the cart and allow customers to choose a different gift
Update texts on your cart

settings.label: Cart Empty Text
settings.info: This shows when the cart is empty

settings.default: Shipping, taxes, and discount codes are calculated at checkout.
settings.label: Checkout Disclaimer
settings.placeholder: Shipping, taxes, and discount codes are calculated at checkout.

settings.label: Subscribe and save
settings.info: You can use {{ discount }} in the label to insert the subscription saving amount

settings.label: Enable subscribe and save
settings.info: Allow customer to opt into a subscription in the cart

settings.label: Show reward progress bar when cart is empty
Top Custom Code
settings.info: Custom code to insert on top of the cart slider

settings.label: Bottom Custom Code
settings.info: Custom code to insert below the checkout button

settings.label: Custom css
settings.info: Css code to be inserted between <style>...</style>

settings.label: Render cart item property binding (JS)
settings.info: Custom JavaScript code to render cart item property binding. This code will be executed for each cart item. Use this to customize the cart item properties. You can access the cart item object using the variable `state.cartItem`.

settings.subheadline: Don't worry. Watch these videos below and fill in the values to make UPEZ work seamlessly with your theme.
settings.content: Having issues with the cart drawer?

settings.label: Force hide the default cart drawer by its CSS selector
settings.info: If you see your default cart drawer opens along with the UPEZ Cart, enter the CSS selector of the cart drawer and UPEZ will hide the default cart away. Leave this empty if the UPEZ cart slider is already working.

settings.label: Cart item count selector
settings.info: Enter the cart bubble item count. Leave empty if the items count is already working.

settings.label: Cart button selector
settings.info: Enter the selector of the cart button that should open the cart slider. Leave this empty if the cart slider is already working

settings.label: Price container selector on Product Page
settings.placeholder: Selector of the container of your product prices
